title: Logo Font ID - Parents Perspective
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722133511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/banner_5540.jpg)

Font of the main “logo” and maybe a suggestion for complementary fonts??

Thanks!
author: indie_uxyz

comments.content:
Hi Andrew,

that’s [Lucida Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722133511/http:/www.ascenderfonts.com/font/lucida-handwriting-italic.aspx) (the subline is [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722133511/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Optima)).  
For complementary typefaces: the [Lucida family is quite huge](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722133511/http:/www.ascendercorp.com/catalog/foundries/bigelow-holmes/) …  
F
